text:
Poem

#Chloroquine #Clorox & #Lysol
Treatment ideas from an assh*le

Trump’s no doctor
plays one on TV

Most corrupt president
in history

Pushes fake cures
endangering lives

People need truth
he only tells lies

#TrumpPressBriefing #coronavirus #BLEACH #TrumpLiesPeopleDie https://t.co/QyKywAKSlQ
